card.name: World Wrestling Federation Heavyweight Title Belt
World Wrestling Federation Intercontinental Title Belt
World Wrestling Federation European Title Belt
World Wrestling Federation Tag Team Title Belts

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Unless your Superstar starter card lists that you may play this card; this card may only be played in a multiplayer Tag Team match. Superstar Value +2 Hand Size +1

card.name: World Wrestling Federation Hardcore Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may play 1 Mid-match card to your Ring area over the maximum allowed. SSV +2

card.name: World Wrestling Federation Lt. Heavyweight Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, any High risk card with the text, 'Can only be played after a maneuver of #D or greater...'; # is now considered to be 1D less than the printed #D on the card. SSV +0

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if the cards titled World Wrestling Federation Heavyweight Belt or WCW Title Belt are in your Ring area; nor can you play either of those cards. SSV +4.

card.name: World Wrestling Federation Women's Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by a Female Superstar. Cannot be played if you have a Title Belt card in your Ring area; nor can you play another Title Belt card. The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may play is increased by 1. Your Hand Size is +1. SSV +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if the WCW Title Belt is in your Ring area, nor can you play that card. At the end of your Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the Raw logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. . SSV +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of your Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card with the Smackdown logo, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. SSV +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if the card titled Tag Team Title Belts is in your Ring Area, nor can you play that card. Can only be played if you cannot play any Title Belt expect the Tag Team Title Belts or if this is a Tag Team format match. At the end of the Pre-match phase, draw 1 card or put 1 card with the RAW logo from your Ringside pile into your hand. +1 SSV.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played if the card titled Tag Team Title Belts is in your Ring Area, nor can you play that card. Can only be played if you cannot play any Title Belt expect the Tag Team Title Belts or if this is a Tag Team format match. At the end of the Pre-match phase, draw 1 card or put 1 card with the Smackdown logo from your Ringside pile into your hand. +1 SSV. Smackdown logo.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Shawn Michaels or if your opponent is Shawn Michaels. When this card is in your Ring area, your Strike maneuvers are +1D and you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse the cards titled Iron Will, Clutch onto Opponent, Commission-er Rules!, Little She Devil, Simply The Best or I;ve Got Two Words for Ya! and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Chris Nowinski or if your opponent is Chris Nowinski. When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match Action: Run-in, you may put this card and the card titled Trash Talkin Interview into your Ringside pile to shuffle up to 12 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal and draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Big Show or if your opponent is Big Show. At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to put the card titled It's Showtime from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring ares you may put this card into your Ringside pile to reverse the cards titled Beating the Odds, Turn the Tide, Roll Out of the Ring, J.R.Style Slobberknocker, or Ring Steps and end your opponent's turn

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played by Rey Mysterio or if your opponent is Rey Mysterio. When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match Action: Run-in, you may put this card and the card titled Fans Love An Underdog into your Ringside pile to draw 2 cards, put 1 Face card from your Ringside pile into your hand, and your opponent's Reversal card to your next card played this turn is +16F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by +1. +1 SSV

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximun number of Pre-match cards your opponent may have in his Ring area is reduced by 1. +1 SSV

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Al Snow. Cannot be played when your opponent is Al Snow. At the end of the Pre-match phase, you may put 1 Smackdown card with an Activated Card Effect from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put it into your Ringside pile to reverse any non-unique Smackdown card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Hardcore Holly. Cannot be played when your opponent is Hardcore Holly. At the end of the Pre-match phase, name a non-unique card. When this card is in your Ring Area you may put it into your Ringside pile to reverse the named card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage area when you reveal your Superstar card. Your opponent's Superstar Value is -1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage Area when you reveal your Superstar card. During your turn you may hide this card, overturn 5 cards, and shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 2 cards, put them under this card, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, if a card under this card is a non-unique non-hybrid card, you may play it as if it were in your hand. When this card is moved from your Ring area, remove all cards under this card from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When successfully played, choose 1: search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into hand, and shuffle your Arsenal; or shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal; or your opponent discards 4 cards; or remove up to 4 non-Heat cards in his Ringside pile from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Vince McMahon. Blank 1 Stipulation card in your opponent's Ring area. When this card is in your Ring area, as a Run-in, you may put it into your Ringside pile to completely reverse any Multi card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal the bottom 3 cards of your Arsenal, put 2 into your hand and shuffle 1 into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play the cards titled That's Broken or That's Balanced. When this card is moved from your Ring area by your opponent, search his Arsenal for 3 cards and remove them from the game. He shuffles his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 Chain card or 1 Volley card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your Superstar Value is +2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put 1 card with the word 'that's'in the title from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal or put 1 card with the word 'that's'in the title from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'that's'in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Kurt Angle, Your Freaking Hero, or Christy. Search your Arsenal for 1 Movie card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may discard 1 card and then put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Chris Jericho, Chris Benoit, Christian, The Crippler, Stacy Keibler, Mae Young, Moolah, The Highlight of the Night, or Leader of the Peepulation. Draw 3 cards and end your turn. During your opponent's next turn, he cannot play maneuvers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by the Undertaker, Deadman Inc., or The Phenom. Your opponent names a card and then reveals the top card of his Arsenal. If it is the named card, it goes into his hand. If it is not, he overturns 7 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Eddie Guerrero or Booker T. Search your opponent's Arsenal for 1 card, remove it from the game, and he shuffles his Arsenal. Search your Arsenal for a card with the same title as that card, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Your next maneuver played this turn is +5D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by John Cena or JBL. Discard 2 cards and then look at your opponent's hand, choose 2 cards, and he removes them from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Triple H, Ric Flair, The Game, or Evolution. Your opponent discards 2 cards. Your next card played this turn is -10F and his Reversal cards to it are +10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by William Regal or Eugene. Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Arsenal and then draw the same number of cards. Then look at your opponent's hand, choose the same number of cards, he shuffles them into his Arsenal, and draws the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed from your opponent's hand. You may put 1 card with an Activated Card Effect from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile and you may put 1 card with an Activated Card Effect from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack Enforcers in your Backstage area. Your Enforcers have no brands. You cannot pack High Risk maneuvers. Before the Pre-match, search your opponent's Backlash deck and Arsenal and he shuffles his Arsenal. Then reveal 1 Enforcer card and choose 1 Enforcer. During the game, he plays with his hand revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You cannot pack Submission maneuvers or High Risk maneuvers. Your Grapple maneuvers are -7F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend Superstar. Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and then put the same number of cards from your Ringside pile into your hand.

card.name: Managed by 'The Mouth of the South' Jimmy Hart

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend Superstar. When this card is in your Ring area, you may put this card into your Ringside pile to completely reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn. When this card is in your Ringside pile, you may remove this card from the game to reverse any non-unique maneuver and end your opponent's turn.

card.name: Atomic Powerbomb Suplexbuster Piledriver Bulldog DDT of Doom

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Female Superstar. Cannot be played when there is a Title Belt card in your Ring area nor can you play another Title Belt card. When this card is in your Ring area, if you successfully play a card with the text 'Can only be packed by a Female Superstar'or 'Can only be packed by a Diva Superstar,'your opponent discards 1 card. Your Superstar Value is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1. Your Superstar Value is +3.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be revealed from your Backstage area when you reveal your Superstar card. Your Superstar Value is +1. At the end of the Pre-match phase all players may put 1 card from their hand on the bottom of their Arsenal and then draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When successfully played, discard 1 card and overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may put 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Backstage area. During any turn, you may put any number of non-Superstar cards from your Backstage area into your Ringside pile and your next card played this turn is -2F for every card put into your Ringside pile this way. Your opponent's non-F:0 cards are +1F for every card in your Backstage area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When any player successfully plays a Foreign Object maneuver, he may choose 2: draw 1 card, shuffle 1 card from his Ringside pile into his Arsenal, or have his opponent discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend Superstar. The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 1. During your turn or if you are about to lose the game via Pinfall victory, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, shuffle up to 9 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and end the current turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1 when the card titled ECW One Night Stand is in your Ring area. Your Superstar Value is +0. Your maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have a Title Belt card in your Ring area. The maximum number of Pre-match cards and Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area is increased by 2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are a Male Superstar, can only be played when your opponent is a Female Superstar. When successfully played, search your opponent's Arsenal for 2 non-Superstar-specific non-Reversal cards, remove them from the game, and he shuffles his Arsenal. Your next card played this turn is -6F and his Reversal cards to it are +9F.

card.name: Let Me Get a Shot In

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is at least 10 less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, search your Arsenal and Ringside pile for 1 Trademark Finisher, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, your Trademark Finishers are F:20 and you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...'text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When successfully played, shuffle cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal equal to the number of Unique cards in your Ring area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -20F and -15D, discard this card and then search your Arsenal or Ringside pile for 1 card with the word 'dynamic' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. You cannot play Action cards with the word 'dynamic' in the title for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Female Superstars. When this card is in your Ring area, cards removed from the game cannot be moved to another location.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card. Your cards are -5F for the rest of this turn and during your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 2 Cheater cards from your Ringside pile into your hand and then draw up to the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 4 Fan Favorite cards from your Ringside pile on the bottom of your Arsenal and then your next maneuver played this turn is -2F, +2D, and +2 Stun Value for every card put on the bottom this way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at the top 10 cards of your Arsenal. Put any number of them on the top of your Arsenal and the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then search your Arsenal for 1 Action: Run-in card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When overturned, completely reverse any card (even if it cannot be reversed) or any card effect and end your opponent's turn. This card is removed from the game. When this card is in your Ringside pile, if your opponent successfully plays an Action card, you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After all players' Pre-match phases, before the first turn of the game, your opponent randomly shuffles cards from his hand into his Arsenal equal to your Superstar Value and then draws the same number of cards he shuffled in. Superstar Value +3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when you have a Title Belt with µintercontinental' in the title in your Ring, nor can you play that card. ßYour Starting Hand Size is +1 and your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1 and your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you can pack the Tag Team Title Belts. ßCannot be played when you have non-Throwback Title Belts in your Ring, nor can you play those cards. ßYour Starting Hand Size is +1, and when you have Smackdown Tag Team Title Belts in your Ring, this card does not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you can pack the Tag Team Title Belts. ßCannot be played when you have non-Throwback Title Belts in your Ring, nor can you play those cards. ßYour Starting Hand Size is +1, and when you have Raw Tag Team Title Belts in your Ring, your opponent chooses 1 less card for I'm Gonna Break You or Fans Love an Underdog. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing First of All. ßAt the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 2 different non-Unique maneuvers and reveal them, your opponent chooses 1, put the chosen card into your Ringside and the remaining card into your hand. ßWhen you are Stone Cold Steve Austin, The Rattlesnake, or Revolution Stone Cold Steve Austin you start the game regardless of Superstar Value or card effects. Superstar Value +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Diva. ßWhen you successfully play a card with µdiva' in the text, put 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. ßYour non-Run-in Action cards with µdiva' in the text are F: 0 and when successfully played draw 1 card. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring, once during each of your turns when your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, ACE: you may reveal a non-unique Action in your hand. If you do, remove the reversed maneuver from the game (or, if you have a non-Faction card in your Ring with a Ric Flair, Booker T, Goldberg, or Sting logo, put the reversed maneuver on the bottom of your Arsenal), your turn does not end, and your next card played this turn may only be the revealed Action. After you play that card, end your turn. Superstar Value +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you can pack the Tag Team Title Belts. Cannot be played when you have a Title Belt in your Ring. ßUnless you are Hall and Nash, The Brain Busters, Harlem Heat, or the Dudley Boyz, you cannot play Title Belts. ßYour maneuvers are +1D. ß Draw 1 card. Superstar Value +1

card.name: World Wrestling Federation Heavyweight Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when you can pack Tag Team Title Belts. This card is considered to have 'old school' in the title. When Back to Basics is in your Ring, your Starting Hand Size is +2; when your Fortitude Rating is 0 and you play a maneuver from under that card 'as if from hand', your opponent cannot play non-Unique reversals to it. Superstar Value +3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing First of All. ßYour opponent resolves first at the end of Pre-match phase, regardless of Superstar Value. ßYour Don't Mess With the Champ! cards cannot be blanked or reversed by hybrid reversals. ßWhen you have a non-Faction Pre-match card with a HHH, CM Punk, or Batista logo in your Ring, your Don't Mess With the Champ! cannot be reversed when you do not have a copy in your Ring. Superstar Value +3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing First of All. ßAfter all players' Pre-match phases are resolved, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal equal to your Superstar Value, put 1 revealed card into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your Arsenal. ßWhen you are John Cena, The Champ, Randy Orton, or a Revolution Superstar of the same name, put 1 additional card into your hand. Superstar Value +3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for a non-Unique High Risk maneuver without 'reversed' in the text or a non-Unique card with 'technical' or µprecision' in the title, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. ßWhen you are the Hurricane, Matt Hardy, Jamie Noble, or X-Pac, your non-unique maneuvers without 'reversed' in the text are -3F. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when First Of All or a Title Belt with 'Heavyweight' or 'WWE' in the title is in your Ring, nor can you play those cards. ßYour Superstar-specific cards do not take up a Pre-match or Mid-match slot in your Ring, and your opponent cannot play I'm Gonna Break You. Superstar Value +4

card.name: World Wrestling Federation Hardcore Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers are -2F and +1D and when your opponent successfully plays a Foreign Object maneuver or Trademark Finisher, put this card into his Ring. When you are Al Snow, Raven, or Stevie Richards, your Foreign Object cards are +1D. Superstar Value +1

alternate.name: World Wrestling Federation Hardcore Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose one: Your maneuvers are +1D, or your opponent's maneuvers are -1D. When you are Rob Van Dam, Lashley, Revolution Tommy Dreamer, Jack Swagger or Christian, draw 1 card. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player's Starting Hand Size is +1. At the end of the Pre-match phase, each player may put 1 card from their Ringside on the bottom of their Arsenal.

card.name: Jesse 'The Body' Ventura, Guest Ringside Announcer

property.name: Traits
property.value: Universally Unique, Run-in, WWF Classic logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing All Together Now. All players' Starting Hand Sizes are -1.ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and then search your Arsenal or Ringside for up to 2 non-Volley non-Unique Cheater cards, reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal; when this effect is reversed, your turn does not end.

alternate.name: Jesse 'The Body' Ventura, Guest Ringside Announcer

property.name: Traits
property.value: Universally Unique, Run-in, Throwback, WWF Classic logo

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is Vince McMahon, The Genetic Jackhammer, or The McMahon Dynasty. When your opponent plays an Action, he overturns 2 cards. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and then search your Arsenal for What A Maneuver!, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal; when this effect is reversed, your turn does not end.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, search your Arsenal for 1 non-Superstar-specific card with 'diva' in the text, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. ACE: You may put this card in your Ringside to reverse a non-maneuver D: 1+ card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is JBL. Your Starting Hand Size is +1. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and then your opponent may discard 3 cards; when he does not, draw up to 1 card each time you successfully play a Unique card for the rest of the turn (up to 5 cards total).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is Ken Kennedy or The Future Of Sports Entertainment. Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card in your Ringside and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the same title as a card with only 1 copy in your Ring, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal; when it is your next card played, you may ignore the 'Can only be played...' text on it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is Triple H, The Game, DX, The King of Kings, or Revolution Triple H. At the end of the Pre-match phase, your opponent randomly reveals 2 cards from his hand, then you may shuffle up to 4 cards from your hand into your Arsenal and draw the same number of cards. ACE: During your turn you may put this card into your Ringside and then his Superstar Ability is blank for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is Zack Ryder. At the end of the Pre-match phase, draw 3 cards and then put 3 cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. ACE: When your opponent reverses an Activated Card Effect from a non-Venue card, you may remove this card from the game and continue your turn; this effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn you may hide this card, overturn 4 cards, and then shuffle 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal; when your Raw Deal Fifth Anniversary is not hidden, you may also shuffle 1 of your cards removed from the game into your Arsenal, and then draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing other Title Belts. Other card effects cannot alter your Superstar Value. Before the Draw Segment of the first turn of the game, put up to # cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and draw the same number of cards, where # is your Superstar Value. Superstar Value +4

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you can pack the Tag Team Title Belts. Cannot be packed when packing other Title Belts with 'tag team' in the title. Before the first Draw Segment of the game, choose one: put up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal OR draw up to 3 cards and then put 2 cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. Superstar Value +1

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is CM Punk, Revolution CM Punk, or The Best Wrestler in the World. Your non-Unique actions are -1F. ACE: You may put this card into your Ringside to completely reverse Ready to Fight, Shane O'Mac Delivers the BASH, Shoot Action, or a Unique non-Superstar-specific antic.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be played when any player is Ryback or Revolution Ryback. All Revolution Off Your Mark cards are Active, and no player may play Shoot Counter when he does not have a maneuver with 'shoot' in the title in his Ring. ACE: When it is not your first turn of the game, and you unsuccessfully play a maneuver, you may discard a maneuver of the same type, and then put this card into your Ringside and your turn does not end, but you can only play maneuvers for the rest of this turn. Reversals to this effect do not move this card from your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, draw 2 cards: Superstar Value: +1 When played, instead draw 1 card: Superstar Value: +2

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, your opponent discards 2 cards: Superstar Value: +3 When played, instead your opponent discards 1 card: Superstar Value: +4

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Look at your opponent's Backlash and choose up to 1 non-Unique Pre-match: he discards it. Your Ability is blank. Unique

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique with 'Target' in the text, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 Extreme from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal: your opponent overturns 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 1 card. If the overturned card is an Extreme: overturn 3 cards and your opponent discards 6 cards. If the overturned card is not an Extreme: overturn 6 cards and your opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, if you successfully play an Extreme: search your Arsenal for up to 1 Extreme, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If this card is in your Arsenal: it also counts as an Extreme.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns: draw up to 1 card. Your Extremes are +1D for each Extreme in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If your opponent's Fortitude is 15 or greater: -15F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may overturn 3 cards: put up to 1 Extreme from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have 5 or more Extremes in your Ring: this card has Momentum.

card.name: Revolution WWE United States Title Belt

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Lower Superstar Value Your opponent cannot play Title Belts. His Superstar Value: -4

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may reveal your hand to your opponent: search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-Unique with a Target not in your hand, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Superstar Value: +3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 card from your hand and 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to 2 cards

property.name: Card Text
property.value: If you have fewer cards in hand than your opponent: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 Extreme: your next Extreme this turn is -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle any number of Extremes from your Ringside into your Arsenal: your opponent overturns the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 2 cards: look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 1 non-Reversal, and he discards it.

card.name: Revolution You've Got a Lot to Learn

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. The maximum Mid-match you may have in your Ring is increased by 1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may either put 1 card from the top of your Arsenal under this card without looking at it or, if you have fewer cards in hand or less Fortitude than your opponent, put 1 random card from under this card into your hand. If this card is moved from your Ring by your opponent: put all cards under this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card with Requirement: Faction, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Card with Exactly 2 Words in the Title

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your opponent's turn, if this card is overturned: you may put this card into your Ring. If the card or effect is not reversed, resume overturning and then end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

card.name: Revolution Four Now Go, Cat Go!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 4 cards. If Revolution One for the Money..., Revolution Two for the Show..., and Revolution Three to Get Ready... are in your Ring: your opponent cannot play Antics.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Extremist Superstar Value: +1 Discard 2 cards. Search your Arsenal for up to 2 non-Core Extremes, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Lower Superstar Value Put all non-Uniques with 'cannot be reversed' in the text from your opponent's Ring into his Ringside. Your opponent cannot play non-Uniques with 'cannot be reversed' in the text.

card.name: Revolution WWE World Heavyweight Title Belts

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before the Draw Segment of the first turn of the game, put up to 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and draw the same number of cards; when you have higher Superstar Value, double that number. Ignore your opponent's card effects that would allow him to start the game. Your Superstar Value is +5.

alternate.name: Revolution WWE World Heavyweight Title Belts

card.name: Revolution WWE Tag Team Title Belts

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card and your Superstar Value is +1; when you are a Tag Team, double those numbers and your Pre-match Capacity is +1.

alternate.name: Revolution WWE Tag Team Title Belts

card.name: Revolution Money in the Bank Briefcase

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card and your Superstar Value is +1; when your opponent has a Title Belt in his Ring, double those numbers. When this card is in your Ring and he is not a GM, he cannot play Corners with 'pack' in the text.

alternate.name: Revolution Money in the Bank Briefcase

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When overturned: this card is -20F. This card is -2F for each Trademark in your opponent's Ring. He has 2 or more Trademarks in his Ring: he discard 2 cards. You have 2 or more Trademarks in your Ring: draw up to 2 cards.
